description:
Imagawa Hayao is the center of the show. We meet him 5 minutes before his 30th birthday - a day very significant to him - when he is about to give his virginity to his beloved blow-up doll Momoko-chan (so named after his favourite JAV actress).
Plagued by self-doubt, he thinks he is hopeless in the dating world. The same thought had the gods who sent him the brothers http://anidb.net/ch25321 [Daigorou] and http://anidb.net/ch25322 [Macaron], to help him lose his precious virginity.
name: Imagawa Hayao
